@EnlightenedOne - There are cheating/netorare stories with revenge/justice.  There is a post, up to part eight now, in the ntr subteddit with links.  Here: https://www.reddit.com/r/netorare/comments/ugahs6/compilation_of_revengemc_moves_onkarmajustice - There is also a guy whose written afterwords to a number of ntr stories.  https://archiveofourown.org/works/33892285/navigate - My favorite of his is Hitorijime Undone.

@EnlightenedOne: Thing is, you're describing a netorare story. In netorare, the narrative encourages the reader to share the POV of the character being cuckolded. As a result, we vicariously experience the cuckold's shame, humiliation, misery, anger, heartache and/or guilty arousal. For genuine cuck fetishists, this is apparently a huge turn-on. But for the rest of us, it's an equally huge bummer. I hate 99% of netorare stories. I have absolutely no desire to experience a cuckold's anguish while reading porn comics ... ... ... But that has *nothing* to do with the Kuzukago-san epic we're talking about. This is not netorare. It's netorase. The narrative encourages the reader to share Sayaka's POV, not that of her cuckolded husband. As a result, we vicariously experience her excitement, thrills, joy and liberation: the fantasy of breaking the rules and getting away with it. It's a feel-good story, the last chapter most of all.

@EnlightenedOne - The lack of justice/revenge/karma and useless/accepting/cucked SO's are key parts of the Japanese NTR fantasy formula.  While Japan pretty much has a cheating subculture. Getting exposed can be social career suicide.  Consider this scandal: https://www.reddit.com/r/OutOfTheLoop/comments/q4zxei/whats_up_with_narumi_runa_meme_recently/  No one there was even married but that dumb bitch even got turned into a meme.  What makes NTR so hot in Japanese porn is how much more taboo it is there compared to the west.

@ EnlightenedOne: This kind of thing is in no way limited to Japan. Everywhere in the world, tons of porn (maybe most porn) is about sexual transgression: immorality, infidelity, promiscuity, perversion, exhibitionism, fetishism, rape, etc. This is because the thrill of the forbidden is HOT. Dirty deeds are HOT. Lots of people occasionally enjoy something other than safe, sweet, dully proper marital sex. They might even want to see some *crazy* shit: the mad debauchery of S-tier sluts unchained. Ftr, this does not make them "cucks". It just means they're horny bastards. And I prefer to stand with the horny bastards. Plus slutting around IRL is fun. I recommend it to everyone :D
